reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress to be a perfect little black dress that's comfortable and can be dressed up or worn casually. Customers disagree on the sizing, with some finding it true to size while others say it runs small.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pleasantly surprised!
items.body: I have never bought a dress from Amazon before but needed one fast for an event. I was pleasantly surprised! This doesn't look cheap... is very soft and comfortable... doesn't hug too tightly but is not baggy either... is very flattering! I am 5 foot 3 inches and the length is perfect! So far I am loving the dress and can see it being worn many times! Also a plus... machine washable! Read more
items.author: Christin M. Baugh

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my event and comfortable
items.body: Fit well, material is perfect light weight and the dress got a lot of compliments. Simple classy and comfortable Read more
items.author: Rosalva B

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Overall nice dress
items.body: Fit was spot on. Material was more tee-shirt like but was soft and hit the right angles perfectly. Shorter than expected. Would recommend. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good value for not much money
items.body: Nice. The fabric is lightweight knit, but not sheer and flows nicely. The sleeves are attractive and provide upper arm coverage. Read more
items.author: Cindy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous
items.body: This dress is gorgeous!!! The material is superb as well!! The fit it is perfect!! Color is perfect!! I can’t wait to wear it on date night!! Read more
items.author: Lyn H

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant dress
items.body: It’s a very nice dress. Material is comfortable and it’s true to size Read more
items.author: Bobbie Reisner

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars You'll love it
items.body: Comfortable. Perfect fit, no cling. Great price. Easily dress up or down. Lightweight. I dressed it up with some jewelry and heels that went perfect, color and all. I would recommend shape wear if you need that, it will show your flaws. But it's a great dress overall. Wash and lay flat to dry. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute Little Cocktail Dress
items.body: Nice and comfortable didn’t think it would be as short as it was, but I still wore it to my friend’s wedding. Love the color and it was easy to dress it up. Read more
items.author: Teresa Kindle Customer

short_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 05-dark Green, 08-purple, 10-white, 01-black, 07-red, 03-navy, 04-royal. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
